Caption: The USA 🇺🇸 used to have the most people living in cities
And the Americas and Europe used to dominate the top 10
But watch China 🇨🇳 and India 🇮🇳 rocket from the mid-1970s!
By 2000 Europe has only two countries left in the top ten
By 2017 Asia accounts for half the top ten and Africa is set to overtake Europe
